content: 3/6/7 sts in pattern cast on 2 sts work 9 sts in pattern repeat - until you have 5/8/9 sts rem in the row work the rem sts in pattern repeat ws and rs once more bind off from ws in rib-pattern break and secure yarn 11 this pattern comes to you as a free gift it is not tested but i have tried my very best to get it right i do have lots of patterns for babies/children they are all available in my ravelry-store here are a few https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/ponny-cardigan https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/spring-leaf-cardigan https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/wee-baby-set https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/pomme-de-pin-sweater my inspiration most often comes from long walks in the forest or by the seaside - my favourite ♥ places to be and i am happy whenever i see a project worked up from my design this pattern is copyrighted by anne b hanssen design/anne b hanssen design ab all rights reserved this includes the photos the instructions the charts and the schematic ♥ there is lots of work behind a pattern i am grateful if you respect my copyright thank you instagram @anne b hanssen design facebook anne b hanssen design 12
